A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson directs the space saga into new territory with a sure hand: his visuals are astounding\, his characters are genuine\, and his decisions are bold. If The Force Awakens breathed new life into the franchise\, The Last Jedi branches it out in truly creative ways. With humor\, twists\, and some of the best action scenes of the entire series\, The Last Jedi is an amazingly fun ride that exceeds (and subverts) expectations.
